name: Swing Hit!
description:
Control the swinging ball by accelerating its speed with the mere touch of your finger and watch delightfully as it blasts through the stacked cubes, taking you higher up the tower. Reach the highest hights and take down your own records - just remember to have a blast!

With its Simple and Smooth gameplay, it will be a joy to play and its vibrant colors and beautiful design will keep you coming back to the game.
